articles.author: Emma Rumney
articles.title: Sahpra approves Pfizer Covid-19 shot for children 12 and up - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: The South African Health Products Authority (Sahpra) has approved Pfizer's Covid-19 vaccine for use by children aged 12 and older, paving the way for the government to offer vaccinations to teenagers.
